Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.1 Kusalapada » 2.4.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
49.
1366Hetuñceva sahetukañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
50.
1367Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1368Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1369Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1370(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
